channel.title: NPC Aggression
channel.description:
I'm making a few bosses and it was going great, but there's a problem.
Whenever I move, it will watch me but won't actually follow me, it will wait until I've stopped moving, then it will walk to me and start attacking. How would I go about fixing this?
Base is allstar.

item.title: NPC Aggression
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

add case (your boss id): in NPCHandler.java bellow:

public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) { switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {

if this is already done sry i cant help you :S

Read full topic
